hints.content:
The denominator in $\dfrac{2}{3}$ is $3$. 

So, there should be $3$ equal parts in each whole.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, two unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 1. Three equal rectangles labeled one-third are above the number line. Each rectangle represents one-third of a whole. !

hints.content:
The numerator in $\dfrac{2}{3}$ is $2$. 

So, we need to move $\dfrac13$ on the number line $\blueD2$ times to reach the point.



[[☃ image 1]]

Which number line shows a point located at $\dfrac{2}{3}$?

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled two-thirds, and an ending tick mark at 1. Three equal rectangles labeled one-third are above the number line. Each rectangle represents one-third of a whole. The first two rectangles from the left are shaded. An arrow points to the right along the number line from the tick mark at 0 to the tick mark at two-thirds. !

hints.content:
Number line $\maroonD{B}$ shows a point located is at $\dfrac23.$



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, two unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 1. There is a pink dot at the second tick mark after 0. !

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{2}{​3}$ on the number line?**
 
[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: $\green{A}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 1. There is a green dot at the second tick mark after 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/74a55e33b10b906b9fcb505628d085b5c36fe79c)

$\maroonD{B}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, two unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 1. There is a pink dot at the second tick mark after 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/81761bda89624ed297f258dd35d181192da4e550)

$\blueD{C}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, five unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 1. There is a blue dot at the second tick mark after 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/de59aceba84dd854e7ec602dcf9746fe24bf4874)
